Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/czmxvg8z2pwgc80owws0g40ccs80ckki640kcgvd5k.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/ib9frp46u3w40kgckw0ocwc8cw8g0002o5pq6dd8ec.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.0 (5225) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.19045.0` Browser: | Firefox License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Language-specific:
AdGuard Chinese Custom filters: | `User rules (url: none)` Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://cn.bing.com/search?pc=MOZR&form=MOZLBR&q=win10](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcn.bing.com%2Fsearch%3Fpc%3DMOZR%26form%3DMOZLBR%26q%3Dwin10) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.info/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.0+%285225%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.19045.0&browser=firefox&filters=2.224&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Assistant%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fassistant%252F4.3%252Fassistant.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=AdGuard%2520DNS%2520Filter%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=false&browsing_security.enabled=false&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=true&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=false&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=https%253A%252F%252Fcn.bing.com%252Fsearch%253Fpc%253DMOZR%2526form%253DMOZLBR%2526q%253Dwin10&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=0&dns.fallback_mode=System&stealth.disable_windows_recall=true)
